sparqlQuery:
PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri 
WHERE {  
   ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . 
   ?uri dbo:starring res:Brad_Pitt . 
   ?uri dbo:director res:Guy_Ritchie . 
}

languageToQuestion.en: Which movies starring Brad Pitt were directed by Guy Ritchie?
languageToQuestion.de: Bei welchen Filmen, in denen Brad Pitt mitspielt, hat Guy Ritchie Regie geführt?
languageToQuestion.es: ¿Que peliculas protagonizadas por Brad Pitt han sido dirigidas por Guy Ritchie?
languageToQuestion.it: Quali film in cui recita Brad Pitt sono stati diretti da Guy Ritchie?
languageToQuestion.fr: Quels films avec Brad Pitt furent dirigés par Guy Richtie?
languageToQuestion.nl: Welke films met Brad Pitt werden geregisseerd door Guy Ritchie?
languageToQuestion.ro: Ce filme cu Brad Pitt ca protagonist au fost regizate de Guy Ritchie?
